history.proof: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec (a * c) (b * c)) as [H1 | H1], (Rle_dec a b) as [H2 | H2]. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l. sfirstorder use: Rmult_0_r, Rmult_le_reg_r unfold: Rle. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmin_opp_Rmax,Rmax_opp_Rmin,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_le_compat. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmin_opp_Rmax,Rmax_opp_Rmin,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_le_compat. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmin_opp_Rmax,Rmax_opp_Rmin,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_le_compat. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmin_opp_Rmax,Rmax_opp_Rmin,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_le_compat. hauto use: Rmult_le_compat_l, Rmult_comm. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmin_opp_Rmax,Rmax_opp_Rmin,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_le_compat.
